name: Crescent Network
description:
"A DeFi Hub which provides innovated tools to empower user's digital assets from not only Crescent chain but also from other blockchains for achieving maximized potential financial returns and managing associated risk in the most efficient way.

Crescent DEX

Order Book & AMM Hybrid
Not only providing general AMM utility, but also more capital-efficient liquidity providing methodology via order book
Ranged Liquidity
Users can select their own price range for their liquidity to leverage their rewards from Liquidity providing
Liquidity providers can form a ranged liquidity with very narrow price range with stable token pairs to have maximized capital efficiency

Delivery Swap

IBC Transfer & Swap
Users can broadcast a single transaction which allows users IBC transfer and swap action

Liquid Staking

Liquid Staking Validators
Governance decides group of validators who are allowed to provide liquid staking utility
Validators in this group will have voting power weights decided by governance
Liquid Staking
Holders can ""liquid stake"" their native tokens to receive bonded tokens which accumulate staking rewards

Boost

Lending
Lenders can lend various tokens to earn interest from borrowers

Boost
Users can borrow multiple tokens to leverage their liquidity providing position
Users not only can leverage their pool positions, but also can hedge their pool position by borrowing related tokens
Liquidation
Risky positions are liquidated by reverse auction

Derivatives

Futures
Users can trade futures for multiple underlying tokens by collateralizing their digital assets, including complex DeFi positions from other blockchains

Relayer Incentive
The Crescent chain will provide mechanical ways to incentivize relayer with enough uptime to have stable and steady interchain connections towards other blockchains
